New Records: Jazz Chisholm Jr. hit his first career walk-off hit
Key Match Events: Jazz Chisholm Jr. hit a game-ending infield single with one out in the 11th inning
Juan Soto launched a go-ahead homer in the sixth
Salvador Perez hit a tying sacrifice fly off Clay Holmes in the seventh
Jose Trevino hit a high chopper to the first baseman and Perez reached to barely tag Trevino on the back of his jersey
Pre-Game Insights: The Yankees increased their advantage in the AL East to 1 1/2 games over Baltimore
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Boone said 'This is a big series win for us against a really good club over there that threw a lot of good pitching at us'
Matt Quatraro said 'It was a tense game. It was tight. It was well pitched on both sides'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Orioles lost 5-3 in 10 innings at Fenway Park when Tyler O'Neill hit a walk-off homer for Boston
